name: ChartAreaFormat
description: Encapsulates the format properties for the overall chart area.

properties.name: fill
properties.description: Represents the fill format of an object, which includes background formatting information.

properties.name: font
properties.description: Represents the font attributes (font name, font size, color, etc.) for the current object.

properties.name: border
properties.description: Represents the border format of chart area, which includes color, linestyle, and weight.

properties.name: roundedCorners
properties.description: True┬áif the chart area of the chart has rounded corners. ReadWrite.

properties.name: colorScheme
properties.description: Returns or sets an┬áinteger┬áthat represents the color scheme for the chart. ReadWrite.
